org.sakaiproject.messagebundle.api

Interface MessageBundleService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageBundleServiceImpl

    public interface MessageBundleService
    This interface is used to manage message bundle data in the system.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • search

        List<MessageBundleProperty> search(String search,
                                 String module,
                                 String baseName,
                                 String locale)
        Parameters:
        search - - text to search for
        module - - module name to search within, null means search all modules
        baseName - - baseName to search within, null means search all baseNames
        locale - - locate to search within, null means search all locales
        Returns:
        list of MessageBundleProperty objects that matches the search inputs

      • getMessageBundleProperty

        MessageBundleProperty getMessageBundleProperty(long id)
        Parameters:
        id - - MessageBundleProperty id to retrieve
        Returns:
        the associated MessageBundleProperty, or null if not found

      • updateMessageBundleProperty

        void updateMessageBundleProperty(MessageBundleProperty mbp)
        updates the existing MessageBundleProperty
        Parameters:
        mbp - - populated MessageBundleProperty object with values that need to be stored

      • getModifiedProperties

        List<MessageBundleProperty> getModifiedProperties(int sortOrder,
                                                int sortField,
                                                int startingIndex,
                                                int pageSize)
        Parameters:
        sortOrder -
        sortField -
        startingIndex -
        pageSize -
        Returns:
        - list of MessageBundleProperty objects in the order prescribed, starting at startingIndex with a length of pageSize

      • getLocales

        List getLocales()
        Returns:
        - list of known locales in the persistent store

      • getModifiedPropertiesCount

        int getModifiedPropertiesCount()
        Returns:
        number of modified properties in the persistent store

      • getAllProperties

        List<MessageBundleProperty> getAllProperties(String locale,
                                           String module)
        Parameters:
        locale - - locale to match, null means all locales
        module - - module to match, null means all modules
        Returns:
        list of MessageBundleProperty for the given locale and module

      • revertAll

        int revertAll(String locale)
        reverts any changed values for properties back to their original values
        Parameters:
        locale - - which locale to revert, null means all locales
        Returns:
        number of values reverted

      • importProperties

        int importProperties(List<MessageBundleProperty> properties)
        creates or updates properties
        Parameters:
        properties - to create or update
        Returns:
        number of properties updated

      • getAllModuleNames

        List<String> getAllModuleNames()
        Returns:
        list of all known moduleNames as Strings

      • getAllBaseNames

        List<String> getAllBaseNames()
        Returns:
        list of all known baseNames as Strings

      • revert

        void revert(MessageBundleProperty mbp)
        revert value back to default value in the persistent store
        Parameters:
        mbp - - object to revert

      • getSearchCount

        int getSearchCount(String searchQuery,
                 String module,
                 String baseName,
                 String locale)
        Parameters:
        searchQuery - - text to search for
        module - - module name to search within, null means search all modules
        baseName - - baseName to search within, null means search all baseNames
        locale - - locate to search within, null means search all locales
        Returns:
        number of MessageBundleProperty found matches inputted search criteria

      • saveOrUpdate

        void saveOrUpdate(String baseName,
                String moduleName,
                ResourceBundle newBundle,
                Locale loc,
                boolean newThread)
        creates or updates the ResourceBundle data for the given baseName, moduleName and locale.
        Parameters:
        baseName -
        moduleName -
        newBundle -
        loc -
        newThread - - set to true to do work in scheduled thread, false with execute immediately

      • getBundle

        Map<String,String> getBundle(String baseName,
                           String moduleName,
                           Locale loc)
        Parameters:
        baseName - - retrieve values for this baseName
        moduleName - - retrieve values for this moduleName
        loc - - retrieve values for this locale
        Returns:
        bundle data as map of name/values pairs
